sentences.en: A unit is equivalent to a glass of wine or a single measure of spirits.
sentences.cn: 1个单位等于1杯葡萄酒或者1标准量的烈酒。

sentences.en: Changing her job like that is equivalent to giving her the sack.
sentences.cn: 那样调换她的工作等于是解雇她.

sentences.en: Eight kilometres is roughly equivalent to five miles.
Ethiopia, for instance uses the equivalent of just twenty kilos of oil per head a year.
sentences.cn: 比如说，埃塞俄比亚每年的人均消费支出仅相当于20公斤的石油。

sentences.en: He had to feed his family on the equivalent of four hundred pounds a month and, with five mouths to feed, he found this very hard.
sentences.cn: 他要用相当于400英镑的月收入来维持五口之家的生计，感觉很艰难。

sentences.en: I had no dollars, but offered him an equivalent amount of sterling.
sentences.cn: 我没有美金，但给了他等值的英镑。

sentences.en: It is anticipated that the equivalent of 192 full-time jobs will be lost.
sentences.cn: 预计将失去相当于192份全职工作的岗位。

sentences.en: Nodding your head is equivalent to saying " yes ".
sentences.cn: 点头就等于说 “ 赞同 ”.

sentences.en: One kilometre is equivalent to two li.
The equivalent of two tablespoons of polyunsaturated oils is ample each day.
sentences.cn: 每天相当于两大汤匙多重不饱和油的量就足够了。

sentences.en: The gangsters offered him a sum equivalent to a whole year's earnings.
sentences.cn: 歹徒提出要给他一笔相当于他一年收入的钱.

sentences.en: The helmets are designed to withstand impacts equivalent to a fall from a bicycle.
sentences.cn: 头盔设计的承受力相当于从自行车上摔下的冲击力。

sentences.en: The word has no equivalent in English.
sentences.cn: 这个单词在英语中没有对应词。

sentences.en: These planes found their rectilinear equivalent in the apartment.
sentences.cn: 这些平面在公寓中找到了其直线对应物.

sentences.en: They will react with hostility to the price rises and calls for equivalent wage increases are bound to be heard.
sentences.cn: 他们将会强烈反对价格上涨，同时肯定会要求相应地增加工资。

sentences.en: You will receive the full equivalent of your money.
sentences.cn: 你将收到与你的款项价值完全同等的物品.

sentences.en: Zip disks could be used to store the equivalent of three music CDs.
sentences.cn: 压缩盘可以用来储存相当于3张音乐光碟容量的内容。

words.tran_cn: [物价][化学][数]等价的，相等的；同意义的

phrases.tran_cn: 等效应力；折算应力；相当应力

trans.tran_en: having the same value, purpose, job etc as a person or thing of a different kind
something that has the same value, purpose, job etc as something else
